title: Her Christmas Surprise
description: I'm not the sort of man who deserves a happy ending, not after the life I've led. But when I see Eve, I know Iâ€™ll need more. She lights up the world for me, like twinkling Christmas lights glinting off fresh snow.When I hear she's being auctioned off to raise money for charity, I won't allow anyone else to win her. It has to be me, and when I win her, I whisk her away to my cabin and keep her all to myself.But when my past comes knocking, Eve will have to decide if my sins are too dark for her to ever find her happily ever after in a man like me.
author: Lucy Darling
